mapper.insert: insert into calendar_data (provincename, one_level, two_level, varietyname, total_export_volume) values (#{provincename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oneLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{twoLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{varietyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalExportVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.select: select provincename, one_level, two_level, varietyname, total_export_volume from calendar_data
